DOC.brief_summary: This study will collect data on patients undergoing hernia repair using the Bard Ventrio Hernia Patch. The study will evaluate hernia recurrence rates, operating time, quality of life and complications associated with the device and surgical procedure.
DOC.brief_title: Study Of Hernia Repair Utilizing The Bard Ventrio Hernia Patch
